sn15.20:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn15.20:5.2: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ.
sn15.20:5.3: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘pācīnavaṃso’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:5.4: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussānaṃ ‘tivarā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:5.5: Tivarānaṃ, bhikkhave, manussānaṃ cattārīsa vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi.
sn15.20:5.6: Tivarā, bhikkhave, manussā pācīnavaṃsaṃ pabbataṃ catūhena ārohanti, catūhena orohanti.
sn15.20:5.7: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kakusandho bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
sn15.20:5.8: Kakusandhassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa vidhurasañjīvaṃ nāma sāvakayugaṃ ahosi aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
sn15.20:5.9: Passatha, bhikkhave, sā cevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā, te ca manussā kālaṅkatā, so ca bhagavā parinibbuto.
sn15.20:5.13: Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ, alaṃ virajjituṃ, alaṃ vimuccituṃ.
sn15.20:6.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘vaṅkako’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:6.2: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussānaṃ ‘rohitassā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:6.3: Rohitassānaṃ, bhikkhave, manussānaṃ tiṃsavassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi.
sn15.20:6.4: Rohitassā, bhikkhave, manussā vaṅkakaṃ pabbataṃ tīhena ārohanti, tīhena orohanti.
sn15.20:6.5: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena koṇāgamano bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
sn15.20:6.6: Koṇāgamanassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa bhiyyosuttaraṃ nāma sāvakayugaṃ ahosi aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
sn15.20:6.7: Passatha, bhikkhave, sā cevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā, te ca manussā kālaṅkatā, so ca bhagavā parinibbuto.
sn15.20:7.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘supasso’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:7.2: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussānaṃ ‘suppiyā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:7.3: Suppiyānaṃ, bhikkhave, manussānaṃ vīsativassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ ahosi.
sn15.20:7.4: Suppiyā, bhikkhave, manussā supassaṃ pabbataṃ dvīhena ārohanti, dvīhena orohanti.
sn15.20:7.5: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno hoti.
sn15.20:7.6: Kassapassa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa tissabhāradvājaṃ nāma sāvakayugaṃ ahosi aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
sn15.20:7.7: Passatha, bhikkhave, sā cevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antarahitā, te ca manussā kālaṅkatā, so ca bhagavā parinibbuto.
sn15.20:8.1: Etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imassa vepullassa pabbatassa ‘vepullo’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:8.2: Etarahi kho pana, bhikkhave, imesaṃ manussānaṃ ‘māgadhakā’tveva samaññā udapādi.
sn15.20:8.3: Māgadhakānaṃ, bhikkhave, manussānaṃ appakaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ;
sn15.20:8.4: yo ciraṃ jīvati so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo.
sn15.20:8.5: Māgadhakā, bhikkhave, manussā vepullaṃ pabbataṃ muhuttena ārohanti muhuttena orohanti.
sn15.20:8.6: Etarahi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke uppanno.
sn15.20:8.7: Mayhaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, sāriputtamoggallānaṃ nāma sāvakayugaṃ aggaṃ bhaddayugaṃ.
sn15.20:8.8: Bhavissati, bhikkhave, so samayo yā ayañcevimassa pabbatassa samaññā antaradhāyissati, ime ca manussā kālaṃ karissanti, ahañca parinibbāyissāmi.
sn15.20:8.12: Yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindituṃ, alaṃ virajjituṃ, alaṃ vimuccitun”ti.
sn15.20:9.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
sn15.20:11.1: * Aniccā vata saṅkhārā,
